write_output module¶

write_output.write_output(time_HRinst, HRavg, btc)[source]¶

Writes to text file time, instantaneous heart rate, average heart rate over user-specified interval, and when brady- or tachycardia occurred in the ECG trace :param time_HRinst: ndarray where first element is times and second element is instantaneous heart rates :param HRavg: list of average heart rates :param btc: list of characters to indicate patient status (– means not enough data, T means tachycardia,

B means bradycardia, and N means normal
Returns:nothing
